sentence.Network_en: Cystic fibrosis is the commonest fatal here-ditary disease.
sentence.Network_cn: 囊性纤维化是最常见的致命遗传疾病。

sentence.Network_en: Cystic fibrosis is the most common fatal genetic disease in the United States.
sentence.Network_cn: 囊性纤维化是美国最常见的致命遗传疾病。

sentence.Network_en: Collins wants to avoid repetition of the confusion that followed the discovery in 1989 of the cystic fibrosis gene.
sentence.Network_cn: 科林斯想要避免1989年发现囊肿性纤维化致病基因后的那种混乱局面再次出现。

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent. (originally referring to the gall bladder): from French cystique or modern Latin cysticus, from late Latin cystis (see cyst)

means.word_mean: 1. of or relating to a normal cyst (as the gallbladder or urinary bladder)
2. of or relating to or resembling a cyst
